articles.author: Ian Parker
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: It's up to Kalvin Phillips to show me he deserves Man City future - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pep Guardiola has said Kalvin Phillips' Manchester City future is in his own hands. The £42million summer signing has made only eight Premier League appearances for City, all as a substitute.
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola has said Kalvin Phillips' Manchester City future is in his own hands.
The £42million summer signing has made only eight Premier League appearances for City, all as a substitute, and wi… [+3750 chars]
